ing: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
des: "This salad has a heavenly flavor with marshmallows, pineapple, bananas, and whipped cream. It's always a big hit at Christmas dinner!"
ins: In a food processor or blender, coarsely grind the cranberries.  Place ground cranberries in a large bowl and stir in the marshmallows, sugar and  pineapple.  Let mixture stand overnight in the refrigerator.  Just before serving, stir in the sliced banana and whipped cream.
